name: Notion Profits Workshop
description: Turn your Notion skills into cashLearn how to use Notion to grow & monetize your audience and make your first $100k onlineThis exclusive workshop will reveal the exact strategies I used to grow an audience of 37k subscribers on YouTube and how I monetized my audience and made over $100k+ with Notion templates.This workshop is your gateway to understanding the full potential of Notion, not just as a productivity tool but as a vehicle for creating digital products and monetizing your audience.
features: The wealth equation and how to create your own niche; Creating and selling Notion templates as digital products; Growing your audience and building a digital brand; A protocol for monetizing your audience in the next 30 days; Content creators who wants to monetize their audience; Entrepreneurs looking to create a new revenue stream; Business owners looking to build an online presence and sell digital products; Anyone who wants to turn their passion for Notion into profits
